answers.answer: I've had to do the same thing 3 times in the last month :/ my bp was about the same as yours, a little higher. There has been slight protein in my urine for months but nothing dangerous. If you do have preeclampsia, they'll probably induce you no later than 38 weeks.

This is my second time with preeclamplsia.  First time it started at 28wks and the plan was to manage it until 36wks then induce me but even with meds my bp kept rising and baby stopped growing so I had a csection at 35wks because my bp was 170/140 and protein very high. This time it started at 15wks and the highest my bp has got is 160/90 but I'm 27wks nd babys growth has slowed and i have been admitted 4 times already so dr thinks I've got about 5-6wks to go before it stops responding to meds and I'll need a csection. My understanding is after 37wks, if your healthy enough and babys growth isnt too effected, they will try to induce you.

Okay Thank Y'all So Much! Yes I've Had A Very Healthy Pregnancy This Far And For Her To Tell Me That Scared Me Cause My Baby Weighs 7 Pounds 5 Ounces Thats What The Sono Lady Said And This Sunday I Turn 38 Weeks So I'm Going To Tell Them If They Have To Induce To Do It On The First Of October

question: So Today I Had My Doctors Appointment And I'm 37 Weeks And 5 Days..My Blood Pressure Was Reading 140/80 So I Go Back Monday To See My Doctor And Tomorrow I Go Drop Off My Urine Sample So I'm Wondering If I Do Have Preclampsia Will They Induce Me Right Away? I'm Due October 10th&Really Really Want My Baby Born In October Even If It Is The First Of October
title: 24 Hour Urine Test
